lead_paragraph: Plenette Pierson, a forward for the W.N.B.A. champion Detroit Shock, is used to playing in front of thousands of fans at home in the United States. This winter, the 6-foot-3 Pierson is showing off her skills in front of nearly empty stands in small-town Israel — and loving it.
